original_text: And Gaal the son of Ebed went out, and stood in the entering of the gate of the city: and Abimelech rose up, and the people that were with him, from lying in wait.
korean_text: 에벳의 아들 가알이 나와서 성읍 문 입구에 설 때에 아비멜렉과 그와 함께 있는 백성이 매복하였던 곳에서 일어난지라

sentences.original_text: And Gaal the son of Ebed went out
and stood in the entering of the gate of the city
and the people that were with him
